column3: Main GUPRI (i.e. PID) under which all terms are defined. Preference is to use PURLs or W3IDs as they provide permanent resolvable identifiers.

column1: Prefixes for controlled vocabularies, schema and ontologies

column4: Prefix for our controlled vocabulary since it is rather tedious to write long URLs all the time
Prefix for SKOS Ontology. This ontology is which our base for defining terms.
Prefix for Provenance, Authoring and Versioning Ontology which properties such as version and createdOn we will use to describe our controlled vocabulary
Prefix for Dublin Core (Terms) Ontology which properties such as title, description, rights, source, etc. we will use to describe our controlled vocabulary as well to define its terms

column2: Controlled vocabulary of terms used in Datacite Schema 4.4

column3: An ORCID ID of the vocabulary creator, repeat this row as needed.
License under which the vocabulary is provided
Date when vocabulary was initially created
Date of the last vocabulary update
This is a set of controlled terms from DataCite/DCMI for the category of resource being described.
